value.name: Labour's controversial green plans could cost 40,000 farming jobs if expanded from Wales to England
value.description: Steve Barclay, the Environmental Secretary has labelled Labour's controversial green plans 'ill thought-out' - amid fears the policy could cost 40,000 farming jobs

value.name: 'Deranged Donald Trump is no friend of Britain - he is a grave security threat'
value.description: Boris Johnson rashly endorsed a Trump triumph as “what the world needs” with a caveat about still supporting Ukraine which is why it’s more important that Rishi Sunak and David Cameron break diplomati

value.description: Labour liar IT is appalling that the lying extremist Azhar Ali remains a Labour member, let alone its Rochdale by-election candidate. He is precisely the sort of crank conspiracy theorist Keir

value.name: Fury as Sir Keir Starmer stands by candidate who blames Israel for October 7 massacre
value.description: SIR Keir Starmer has sparked fury by standing by a candidate who blamed Israel for the October 7 massacre. Labour’s leader was rapped for appeasing anti-Semitism. Sir Keir refused to withdraw

value.name: Labour by-election candidate apologises for ‘deeply offensive’ Israel claims
value.description: Azhar Ali remains Labour’s candidate in the Rochdale by-election, which was triggered by the death of MP Sir Tony Lloyd.

value.name: Labour candidate 'wrong' to say Israel allowed 7 October attack
value.description: Remarks made by Azhar Ali have been branded "warped" and "disgraceful" by the Jewish community, which fears they could further fuel hostility, but with the deadline for nominations closed it is too late for the party to replace him.

value.name: Will my son resent me for sending him to a state school - and paying for his sister's posh prep?
value.description: Our 13-year-old son goes to a state grammar school while our ten-year-old daughter started at a posh prep last year. Why? We couldn't afford to send both of them.

value.name: 'Hold your children tight', Brianna Ghey's mother tells vigil marking a year since her murder
value.description: Brianna Ghey’s mother has told a crowd gathered to mark one year since her daughter’s death to “hold your children tight”. People gathered at Golden Square Shopping Centre in Warrington on Sunday to mark a year since the 16-year-old was murdered by teenagers Scarlett Jenkinson and Eddie Ratcliffe in a park in Cheshire.

value.name: Brianna Ghey’s mother gives tearful tribute on anniversary of teenager’s brutal murder
value.description: Brianna’s mother Esther Ghey wore a pink coat, the teenager’s favourite colour, as she paid tribute to her “amazing, unique and joyful” daughter in a speech in the family’s hometown, with many well-wishers seen wiping away tears.

video.name: Brianna Ghey’s mother gives tearful tribute on anniversary of teenager’s brutal murder
